alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Fulton (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 12:30AM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN FRANKLIN AND SOUTHEASTERN FULTON COUNTIES THROUGH 100 AM EDT... At 1230 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Breezewood to near Martinsburg. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. Locations impacted include... Chambersburg, Greencastle, St. Thomas, Warfordsburg, Mercersburg, McConnellsburg, Harrisonville, Marion, Fort Loudon, Big Cove Tannery, Needmore, Upper Strasburg, Claylick, Fannettsburg, Maugansville, State Line, Middleburg, Williamson, Upton and Warrenton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
